thread.title: Madeleine Benfield-White

author: Madeleine Benfield-White
title: Madeleine Benfield-White
text: THS has an extensive choice of places in the world to dog and house sit in. The dates vary from a few days to a month, or longer. My experience has been that both parties, home/dog owners and sitters feel safe and secure in the knowledge that any sits are vetted by a trustworthy business. The back-up for sitters with available vet advice is a godsend. Moreover, the connection with car rental companies and travel agents eases taking on a sit and makes getting there and getting around once there so simple. I recommend the company when talking to possible clients, sure in the knowledge that THS will give them an excellent service.
